lead_paragraph: The Nevada Supreme Court has ordered a new trial for a man convicted of murdering a Hells Angels leader in a 2011 shootout between rival motorcycle clubs at a Reno-area casino.

headline.print_headline: Nevada Justices Order New Trial for Biker Convicted of Killing Hells Angels Leader
headline.main: Nevada Justices Order New Trial for Biker Convicted of Killing Hells Angels Leader

snippet: The Nevada Supreme Court has ordered a new trial for a man convicted of murdering a Hells Angels leader in a 2011 shootout between rival motorcycle clubs at a Reno-area casino.
abstract: Nevada Supreme Court orders new trial for Ernesto Gonzalez,  former president of the Nicaragua chapter of the Vagos Motorcycle Club, who was convicted of murdering San Jose Hells Angels leader Jeffrey Pettigrew in 2011 shootout in Nevada.
